CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "Dazzling Displays Exhibit Top Products at Fair...12. John Morris, Miss Ruby Young and Bill Kennler demonstrated the harmonious Hammond Organ distributed by the C.C. Mellor and Company in their booth...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: John Morris, Ruby Young (Buchanan), and Bill Kennler posing in C. C. Mellor booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Young, Ruby.
